results.title: Clinical pharmacokinetics of atenolol--a review.
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@impaired renal function@@@ elimination half life of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ gradually increases to values of 36 h in @<m>DISEASE_Hemolytic_Uremic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006463 @@@uraemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (glomerular filtration rate (GFR) less than 10 ml/min).

citations.NLM: Kirch W, Görg KG. Clinical pharmacokinetics of atenolol--a review. Eur J Drug Metab Pharmacokinet. 1982;7(2):81-91. PMID: 6749509
citations.BibTeX: @article{6749509, title={Clinical pharmacokinetics of atenolol--a review.}, author={Kirch W and Görg KG}, journal={Eur J Drug Metab Pharmacokinet}, volume={7}, number={2}, pages={81-91}}

results.title: Blockers of beta and H2 receptors and secondary hyperparathyroidism in uraemia.
results.text_hl: The suppressive effect on @GENE_PTH @GENE_5741 @@@PTH@@@ secretion of @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@, a @GENE_MS4A1 @GENE_931 @@@beta 1@@@ and @GENE_IGKV5_2 @GENE_28907 @@@beta 2@@@ blocker, and that of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ a specific @GENE_MS4A1 @GENE_931 @@@beta 1@@@ betablocker was compared in 24 @<m>DISEASE_Hemolytic_Uremic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006463 @@@uraemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ not yet on dialysis in a cross over study.

citations.NLM: Makdassi R, Decourcelle PH, Moriniere P, Coevoet B, de Fremont JF, Kassouf J, Roussel A, Gheerbrand JD, Andrejak M, Fournier A. Blockers of beta and H2 receptors and secondary hyperparathyroidism in uraemia. Proc Eur Dial Transplant Assoc. 1981;18():642-7. PMID: 7329992
